name: Me, Morrie
description:
Me, Morrie is an interactive novel that showcases the relationship between Morrie, a grandfather who is suffering from Alzheimer's Disease, and his grandson Mendel. Over the course of the story, players will get a glimpse into what a family may experience when a loved one is impacted by Alzheimer’s. 

Creators

  • Chaoran Huang - Game Designer, Sound Designer & Programmer
  • Elsa Liu - Game Designer, Producer & Programmer 
  • Kimmy Stewart - Game Designer & Writer 
  • Suli Zhang - Game Designer & Artist
